scenario.name: voip_probe_options_check
scenario.send: OPTIONS sip:{{TARGET_NUMBER}}@{{SIP_DOMAIN}} SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "{{CALLER_ID}}" <sip:{{CALLER_ID}}@{{SIP_DOMAIN}}>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:{{TARGET_NUMBER}}@{{SIP_DOMAIN}}> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 OPTIONS Contact: <sip:{{CALLER_ID}}@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Accept: application/sdp Content-Length: 0

OPTIONS sip:{{TARGET_NUMBER}}@{{SIP_DOMAIN}} SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "{{CALLER_ID}}" <sip:{{CALLER_ID}}@{{SIP_DOMAIN}}>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:{{TARGET_NUMBER}}@{{SIP_DOMAIN}}> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 OPTIONS Contact: <sip:{{CALLER_ID}}@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Authorization: [authentication username="{{SIP_LOGIN}}" password="{{SIP_PASSWORD}}"] Accept: application/sdp Content-Length: 0
